mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, LOAD_DATE, EDIT_DATE, TITLE, TITLE_SUB, CONTENT, CONTENTS_IDX, CONTENT_MD FROM CONTENTS WHERE CONTENTS_IDX = #{CONTENTS_IDX}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM CONTENTS
SELECT USER_ID, LOAD_DATE, EDIT_DATE, TITLE, TITLE_SUB, CONTENT, CONTENTS_IDX, CONTENT_MD FROM CONTENTS ORDER BY LOAD_DATE DESC
SELECT USER_ID, LOAD_DATE, EDIT_DATE, TITLE, TITLE_SUB, CONTENT, CONTENTS_IDX, CONTENT_MD FROM CONTENTS ORDER BY LOAD_DATE DESC LIMIT #{START} , #{COUNT}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CONTENTS (USER_ID, LOAD_DATE, EDIT_DATE, TITLE, TITLE_SUB, CONTENT, CONTENT_MD) VALUES ( #{USER_ID}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i'), #{TITLE}, #{TITLE_SUB}, #{CONTENT}, #{CONTENT_MD} )
mapper.update: UPDATE CONTENTS SET TITLE = #{TITLE}, TITLE_SUB = #{TITLE_SUB}, EDIT_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i'), CONTENT = #{CONTENT}, CONTENT_MD = #{CONTENT_MD} WHERE CONTENTS_IDX = #{CONTENTS_IDX}
